metadata.title: Kai-Chun Hsu | A software engineer who loves writing.
metadata.description: A software engineer who loves writing. Not just code. But writing novels too.

about.title: Kai-Chun Hsu
about.subtitle: I write novels and code.
about.description: A Taiwanese software engineer in the SF Bay Area. My goal is to finish my first novel this year, and two more short stories next year.
